name: FantasyNewsBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Wake up each day to news that effects you. From goblin attacks to festival times and dragon sightings. Fantasy briefing covers the news in a fictional kingdom full of adventure and medieval everyday life. Expect world building and news events that compound on each other to create overarching stories throughout the week. 

Light violence.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
